select distinct u.id, u.dept_id, u.user_name, u.nick_name, u.email, u.phonenumber, u.status, u.create_time from sys_user u left join sys_dept d on u.dept_id = d.id left join sys_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id left join sys_role r on r.id = ur.role_id where u.del_flag = '0' and (r.id != #{roleId} or r.id IS NULL) and u.id not in (select u.id from sys_user u inner join sys_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id and ur.role_id = #{roleId})
AND u.user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
AND u.phonenumber like concat('%', #{phonenumber}, '%')
${params.dataScope}
